flawed_nl_solution:
The cypress trees will earn Gloria 20 trees * $100/tree = $<<20*100=2000>>2000
From the sale of the cypress trees, Gloria will also make 600 trees * $200/tree = $<<600*200=120000>>120000
Finally, the maple trees will bring in 24 trees * $300/tree = $<<24*300=72000>>72000
Combining all the amounts will give Gloria a total of $150 + $2000 + $120000 + $72000 = $<<150+2000+120000+72000=194150>>194150
Subtracting the cost of the mountain cabin from the total will leave Gloria with a balance of $194150 - $129000 = $<<194150-129000=65150>>65150
#### 65150

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7200, not 72000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
